title: Epic: Testing infrastructure
body:
Set up testing infrastructure: Zig unit tests per pipeline stage, golden/snapshot tests (compile Haskell snippets, compare output), end-to-end tests (compile + run + check stdout). Borrow simple programs from GHC's testsuite where possible.

**Key decisions**: #25 in DESIGN.md
**Sub-tasks to split later**: test harness, golden test runner, GHC testsuite import
